definition: to put in order/to arrange/to decorate/to fix up/to deploy

sentences.english: One day Mrs. Slaton gave the class an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，斯萊頓夫人給全班同學佈置了一項作業。

sentences.english: Anchor rope distribution is the key point in prestressed floodgate room design.
sentences.chinese: 錨索佈置是預應力閘室設計的關鍵所在。

sentences.english: Even so, some teachers still gave us homework.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，有些老師還是佈置了寒假作業。

sentences.english: Many arrange to fight in a sitting posture.
sentences.chinese: 許多人佈置好可以坐着戰鬥的位置。

sentences.english: Vertical or horizontal layout, full load-bearing steel frame design.
sentences.chinese: 立式或臥式佈置，全承重鋼架設計。

sentences.english: He's just been setting up a bachelor party, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說他剛纔在佈置一個單身漢派對的會場。

sentences.english: Stone said his work skyshatter organization would have decorated.
sentences.chinese: 石破天說他的工作組織上早就佈置好了。

sentences.english: During this period you should arrange your home to reflect your grief and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 這段期間內，家裏的佈置要有哀泣的氣氛。

sentences.english: They’ll make the invitations, hang the decorations, and even serve the food.
sentences.chinese: 他們將會發邀請函，佈置裝飾品，和甚至提供食物。

sentences.english: My teacher arranged me homework and asked me to make a bargain with a stranger who looks like a black sheep.
sentences.chinese: 老師給我佈置了一個作業，讓我和看起來像敗家子。

sentences.english: Urban planning from two-dimensional arrangement to three-dimensional planning began long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 城市規劃由平面的佈置轉向三維的規劃，歷史源遠。

sentences.english: The inside of each house depended on the personality of its owner.
sentences.chinese: 每個房間內怎樣的佈置，這要看各個使用者的性格了。

sentences.english: Clay warehouse near 11 o clock at night, Sun Weijun decorate plan.
sentences.chinese: 夜裏11點紅土倉庫附近，孫維君佈置作戰計劃。

sentences.english: But I don't feel confident enough delegating that much work on a film set.
sentences.chinese: 我不覺得我有足夠的信心在電影拍攝場去佈置工作。

sentences.english: I'm going to end with the final reading response.
sentences.chinese: 本節課最後佈置一個課後作業。

sentences.english: "Do insides in the house all set out?"Chen Shi lightly continues to ask a access.
sentences.chinese: “屋子裏都佈置好了麼？”沈氏淡淡的繼續問道。

to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
to set up/to arrange/to lay out
